languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, нам воксирует спасенное судно. Командование корабля передает миллионы благодарностей за оказанную помощь и сообщает о высланном шаттле, который доставит что-то на борт — видать, капитан решил лично отблагодарить своего покровителя за свою спасенную шкуру. Как только передача состоится, корабль тут же покинет систему — сдается мне, трясутся за свое продырявленное корыто и хотят сбежать подальше из опасной системы".

"Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, нам воксирует спасенное судно. Командование корабля передает миллионы благодарностей за оказанную помощь и сообщает о высланном шаттле, который доставит что-то на борт — видать, капитан решил лично отблагодарить своего покровителя за свою спасенную шкуру. languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un message-vox du vaisseau secouru. Son commandement vous remercie infiniment pour votre aide et vous informe qu'une navette de fret a été envoyée en direction de notre vaisseau. Apparemment, le capitaine tient à vous remercier personnellement de lui avoir sauvé la vie. Dès que le transfert sera terminé, le bâtiment quittera le système. J'imagine qu'ils craignent pour l'intégrité de leur tas de ferraille et qu'ils préfèrent déguerpir dès que possible. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu un message-vox du vaisseau secouru. Son commandement vous remercie infiniment pour votre aide et vous informe qu'une navette de fret a été envoyée en direction de notre vaisseau. Apparemment, le capitaine tient à vous remercier personnellement de lui avoir sauvé la vie. Dès que le transfert sera terminé, le bâtiment quittera le système. J'imagine qu'ils craignent pour l'intégrité de leur tas de ferraille et qu'ils préfèrent déguerpir dès que possible. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un mensaje de voco de la nave rescatada. El mando de la nave nos transmite su inmenso agradecimiento por la ayuda e informa de que han enviado una lanzadera para entregar algo a nuestra nave; parece que el capitán ha decidido recompensarle personalmente por salvarle el pellejo. En cuanto termine la transferencia, la nave se marchará del sistema. Imagino que estarán preocupados por la integridad de su tartana agujereada y querrán alejarse todo lo posible de este sistema».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido un mensaje de voco de la nave rescatada. El mando de la nave nos transmite su inmenso agradecimiento por la ayuda e informa de que han enviado una lanzadera para entregar algo a nuestra nave; parece que el capitán ha decidido recompensarle personalmente por salvarle el pellejo. En cuanto termine la transferencia, la nave se marchará del sistema. Imagino que estarán preocupados por la integridad de su tartana agujereada y querrán alejarse todo lo posible de este sistema».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、救助した船からのヴォクス・メッセージが届きました。船の指揮官は、あなたの多大なる援助に感謝を述べ、シャトルがこちらの船へと何かを届けるために派遣されたとの報告を寄せています…どうやらキャプテンは、自身の身を守ってくれたあなたに直接お礼をすることにしたようです。移送が行われ次第、艦は星系より離脱します。彼らは、穴の空いたバケツの完全性を心配して、この危険な星系からできるだけ早く離れたがっているのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、救助した船からのヴォクス・メッセージが届きました。船の指揮官は、あなたの多大なる援助に感謝を述べ、シャトルがこちらの船へと何かを届けるために派遣されたとの報告を寄せています…どうやらキャプテンは、自身の身を守ってくれたあなたに直接お礼をすることにしたようです。移送が行われ次第、艦は星系より離脱します。彼らは、穴の空いたバケツの完全性を心配して、この危険な星系からできるだけ早く離れたがっているのでしょう」

languages.text: “舰长大人，获救舰船向我们发来了音阵信息。对方舰长对您的帮助表示了最真挚的谢意。报告说，他们派来了一艘架穿梭机，来给我们的飞船送些礼物。看得出来，对方舰长打算亲自感谢您救了他一命。等跃迁结束之后，那艘船就会离开这个星系。我猜测，他们应该是担心那艘到处都是窟窿的破桶恐怕飞不了多久，打算尽可能远离这个危机四伏的星系。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，获救舰船向我们发来了音阵信息。对方舰长对您的帮助表示了最真挚的谢意。报告说，他们派来了一艘架穿梭机，来给我们的飞船送些礼物。看得出来，对方舰长打算亲自感谢您救了他一命。等跃迁结束之后，那艘船就会离开这个星系。我猜测，他们应该是担心那艘到处都是窟窿的破桶恐怕飞不了多久，打算尽可能远离这个危机四伏的星系。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Vox-Nachricht des geretteten Schiffs erhalten. Die Brücke des Schiffs übermittelt ihren übertriebenen Dank für Eure Hilfe und hat ein Shuttle entsandt, das etwas auf unser Schiff bringen soll ... wie es scheint, möchte Euch der Kapitän persönlich für seine Rettung danken. Nach dem Transfer wird das Schiff das System umgehend verlassen ... ich nehme an, sie sorgen sich um die Integrität ihres durchlöcherten Rumpfes und wollen möglichst weit weg von diesem gefährlichen System."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, kurtarılan gemiden bir voks mesajı aldık. Geminin komutanı, desteğiniz için büyük teşekkürlerini iletiyor. Gemimize bir şey teslim etmek üzere bir mekiğin gönderildiği raporunu aldık. Görünüşe göre kaptan, canını kurtardığınız için size kişisel olarak teşekkür etmek istemiş. Gemi, nakil gerçekleşir gerçekleşmez sistemden ayrılacak. Tahminimce delik deşik edilmiş teneke yığınlarının tek parça kalamayacağından endişeliler ve bu tehlikeli sistemden olabildiğince uzaklaşmak istiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a vox-message from the rescued vessel. The ship's command sends their inordinate thanks for your assistance and reports that a shuttle has been dispatched to deliver something to our ship — it seems the captain has decided to personally thank you for saving his hide. As soon as the transfer takes place, the ship will depart the system — I imagine they are worried about the integrity of their hole-riddled bucket and want to get as far away from this perilous system as they can."
